a.n: Thomas & Friends: Big World! Big Adventures! XXIII (1)

p.k: Bulgy thinks that people should travel by bus instead of rail. So when he witnesses an accident at the construction site which pollutes the railway water tower, he doesn't tell anyone. Soon the engines are breaking down, leaving Bulgy and Bertie to carry all their passengers. But having so many passengers is not so easy for the buses on their own!
